00001 /*
00002  * qpipe.c
00003  *
00004  *  Created on: 2009-04-23
00005  *      Author: Jean-Lou Dupont
00006  *
00007  *
00008  *                 server_to_client
00009  *      SERVER    ------------------>    CLIENT
00010  *
00011  *                 client_to_server
00012  *                <------------------
00013  *
00014  */

00016 #include "../includes/helpers.h"
00017 #include "../includes/qpipe.h"
00018

00020 // PRIVATE
00021 void qpipe_safe_free(queue *q);
00022 
00023 
00024 // ============= API ==================
00025 
00026 qpipe *qpipe_create(void) {
00027 
00028         qpipe *tmp;
00029         queue *tqe, *tqi;
00030 
00031         tmp = malloc(sizeof(qpipe));
00032         if (NULL!=tmp) {
00033 
00034                 tqe = queue_create();
00035                 tmp->server_to_client = tqe;
00036 
00037                 tqi = queue_create();
00038                 tmp->client_to_server = tqi;
00039 
00040                 // if either one isn't created,
00041                 //  better have nothing
00042                 if ((NULL==tqe) || (NULL==tqi)) {
00043                         queue_destroy(tqe);
00044                         queue_destroy(tqi);
00045                         free(tmp);
00046                         tmp = NULL;
00047                 }
00048         }
00049 
00050         return tmp;
00051 }// create
00052 
00053 
00054 /**
00055  * Sends a message from the Client TO Server
00056  *
00057  */
00058 int qpipe_send_to_server(qpipe *qp, void *msg) {
00059         DEBUG_LOG_NULL_PTR(qp,  LOG_ERR, "qpipe_send_to_server [null qp]");
00060         DEBUG_LOG_NULL_PTR(msg, LOG_ERR, "qpipe_send_to_server [null msg]");
00061         DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG, "qpipe_send_to_server");
00062 
00063         return queue_put(qp->client_to_server, msg);
00064 
00065 } // server_send
00066 
00067 
00068 /**
00069  * Sends a message to the Client FROM Server
00070  */
00071 int qpipe_send_to_client(qpipe *qp, void *msg) {
00072         DEBUG_LOG_NULL_PTR(qp,  LOG_ERR, "qpipe_send_to_client [null qp]");
00073         DEBUG_LOG_NULL_PTR(msg, LOG_ERR, "qpipe_send_to_client [null msg]");
00074         DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG, "qpipe_send_to_client");
00075 
00076         return queue_put(qp->server_to_client, msg);
00077 } // server_receive
00078 
00079 
00080 /**
00081  * Receives a message from the Server
00082  */
00083 void *qpipe_receive_from_server(qpipe *qp) {
00084         DEBUG_LOG_NULL_PTR(qp,  LOG_ERR, "client_send [null qp]");
00085         DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG, "qpipe_receive_from_server");
00086 
00087         return queue_get(qp->server_to_client);
00088 }// client_send
00089 
00090 
00091 /**
00092  * Receives a message from the Client
00093  */
00094 void *qpipe_receive_from_client(qpipe *qp) {
00095         DEBUG_LOG_NULL_PTR(qp, LOG_ERR, "qpipe_receive_from_client [null qp]");
00096         DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG, "qpipe_receive_from_client");
00097 
00098         return queue_get(qp->client_to_server);
00099 }// client_receive

00108 
00109 void qpipe_safe_free(queue *q) {
00110 
00111         if (NULL!=q)
00112                 free(q);
00113 
00114 } // safe_free
